entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
